    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Called to initialize the Book Movie Controller after its root element has been completely processed. Calls methods to configure the date picker and table view.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
        resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the object was not localized.
        See Also:
        initialize

      • getUser

        public void getUser(User user)
        Gets User object called user.
        Parameters:
        user - a user object

      • Back

        public void Back(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Launches the customer view. Creates new pane by loading employee fxml, and a new scene from the pane. Gets the stage information from the event source and sets the new scene.
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent after back button is pressed

      • searchMovie

        public void searchMovie()
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Search for movies showing based on the title and date. The user can search by both title and date, by either title or date, or get all showings but will only be shown future movie showings.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
